name: Big Stone Gulch
blurb: The settlement for MacArthur Park's newest caravan and your home
people: Constable P. J. Wright: Retired military general and capable leader of the town -bProfessor Plummage: A nervous professor of the occult. Though he's quite knowledgable, he's more at home in the library than a dig site. -bJacob of the Setting Sun: Illuminator of the Lantern King. He's taken a liking to the town's grit and determination.
misc: It seems the crops are growing at a supernatural rate...MacArthur truly knows how to pick a location!

name: Seamstress Cavern
blurb: A great mining colony that travels to the center of the world
misc: Rumor has it that at the bottom of the cavern is a seamestress sewing a grand tapestry and the first to lay their fingers on it is granted a wish.

name: Purity Snag
blurb: A now destroyed salt mining town. Jackie's Wacko Boys got to them before you arrived.

name: Cactus Pass
blurb: A dense labyrinth of interlocking saguaro and cholla cacti
people: Emily 'Wild Hog' Chandler: An old woman living deep in the Cactus Pass
misc: Keep track of where you've been. The Cinderheart Marauder knows these paths better than you.

name: Porcupine Kids
blurb: The Living Dead walk. The arrows littering their bodies do little to slow them down
misc: They seem to have a peculiar fascination with the Pale Oak Geyser, never travelling too far from it.

name: The Long Goodbye
people: -bFabian H.T. Sampson: Halfling owner of the Long Goodbye.

name: Cinderheart Marauder
blurb: A massive beast whose paws are so hot it turns sand into glass.
